channel.title: Comments on: Installing the tikz terminal

item.title: By: Haouam
item.dc:creator: Haouam
item.description: Don't work for me. I installed gnuplot5.4.3. copy paste two lines, changing lua5.1 to 5.2 . I get link broken. Nothing happened. unknown terminal. ubuntu 21.10
item.content:encoded:
Don’t work for me.
I installed gnuplot5.4.3. copy paste two lines, changing lua5.1 to 5.2 . I get link broken. Nothing happened.
unknown terminal.
ubuntu 21.10

item.title: By: hagen
item.dc:creator: hagen
item.description: Lua can be found at <a href="http://www.lua.org/" rel="nofollow">http://www.lua.org/</a>

item.title: By: Agile Aspect
item.dc:creator: Agile Aspect
item.description: And if you're not running a Debian based OS, where does one find Lua?
item.content:encoded: And if you’re not running a Debian based OS, where does one find Lua?
